Description: 312351079 - I/JS/020322/DPL/01 - You have failed to ensure the health, safety and welfare of your employees in that you as an employer are  carrying out work which is liable to expose your employees to a substance hazardous to health, namely  welding fumes from welding mild steel, which is a carcinogenic fume and you have failed to apply control  measures appropriate to the work activity to reduce or minimise the risk to as low as is reasonably practicable.
